item.text: The Lord told Joshua, “Don’t be afraid and don’t panic! Take the whole army with you and march against Ai! See, I am handing over to you the king of Ai, along with his people, city, and land.
Do to Ai and its king what you did to Jericho and its king, except you may plunder its goods and cattle. Set an ambush behind the city.”
Joshua and the whole army marched against Ai. Joshua selected 30,000 brave warriors and sent them out at night.

He <st data-num="06680 0559">ordered</st> them, “<st data-num="07200" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="0859 0693 05892">set an ambush</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">behind</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>. <st data-num="0408" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="07368" class="">go</st> <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="07368" class="">far</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>; <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of you <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="03559" class="">ready</st>!

<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">troops</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> are <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> me will <st data-num="07126 0413">approach</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>. <st data-num="01961 03588">When</st> they <st data-num="03318" class="">come out</st> to <st data-num="07125" class="">fight</st> us <st data-num="0834" class="">like</st> <st data-num="07223" class="">before</st>, we will <st data-num="05127" class="">retreat</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">from</st> them.

They will <st data-num="03318 0310">attack</st><n id="1" /> us <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> we have <st data-num="05423" class="">lured</st> them <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> they will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘They are <st data-num="05127" class="">retreating</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">from</st> us <st data-num="0834" class="">like</st> <st data-num="07223" class="">before</st>.’ We will <st data-num="05127" class="">retreat</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">from</st> them.
Then you rise up from your hiding place and seize the city. The Lord your God will hand it over to you.
When you capture the city, set it on fire in keeping with the Lord’s message. See, I have given you orders.”
Joshua sent them away and they went to their hiding place west of Ai, between Bethel and Ai. Joshua spent that night with the army.
Bright and early the next morning Joshua gathered the army, and he and the leaders of Israel marched at the head of it to Ai.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="05971 04421">troops</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> were <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him <st data-num="05927" class="">marched up</st> and <st data-num="05066 0935">drew</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">near</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>.<n id="1" /> They <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> of <st data-num="05857" class="">Ai</st> <st data-num="0996 0996 05857">on the other side of</st> the <st data-num="01516" class="">valley</st>.<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> <st data-num="02568 0505" class="">5,000</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> and <st data-num="07760" class="">set</st> an <st data-num="0693" class="">ambush</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> <st data-num="01008" class="">Bethel</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0996" class="">and</st> <st data-num="05857" class="">Ai</st>.
The army was in position—the main army north of the city and the rear guard west of the city. That night Joshua went into the middle of the valley.

When the king of Ai and all his people saw Israel, they rushed to get up early. Then the king and the men of the city went out to meet Israel in battle, at the meeting place near the rift valley. But he did not realize an ambush was waiting for him behind the city.

<st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> pretended to be <st data-num="05060" class="">defeated</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">by</st> them, and they <st data-num="05127" class="">retreated</st> along the <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> to the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="05971 0834">reinforcements</st><n id="1" /> in <st data-num="05892" class="">Ai</st><n id="2" /> were <st data-num="02199" class="">ordered</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="07291 0310">chase</st> them; they <st data-num="07291 0310">chased</st> <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> and were <st data-num="05423" class="">lured away</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>.
No men were left in Ai or Bethel; they all went out after Israel. They left the city wide open and chased Israel.
The Lord told Joshua, “Hold out toward Ai the curved sword in your hand, for I am handing the city over to you.” So Joshua held out toward Ai the curved sword in his hand.

When he <st data-num="05186" class="">held out</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, the <st data-num="0693" class="">men waiting in ambush</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">rose up</st> <st data-num="04120" class="">quickly</st> from their <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> and <st data-num="07323" class="">attacked</st>.<n id="1" /> They <st data-num="0935" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="03920" class="">captured</st> it, and <st data-num="04116" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="03341" class="">set</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">it</st> on <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>.

When the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="05857" class="">Ai</st> <st data-num="06437" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">around</st>, they <st data-num="07200 02009">saw</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="06227" class="">smoke</st> from the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">ascending</st> into the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st> and <st data-num="03808 01961 03027">were so shocked they were unable</st> to <st data-num="05127" class="">flee</st> in <st data-num="02008" class="">any</st> <st data-num="02008" class="">direction</st>.<n id="2" /> In the meantime the <st data-num="05971" class="">men</st> who were <st data-num="05127" class="">retreating</st> to the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> <st data-num="02015" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> their <st data-num="07291" class="">pursuers</st>.

When <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="0693" class="">men in ambush</st> had <st data-num="03920" class="">captured</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> and <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> was <st data-num="05927" class="">going up</st> in <st data-num="06227" class="">smoke</st>,<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="07725" class="">turned around</st> and <st data-num="05221" class="">struck down</st> the <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="05857" class="">Ai</st>.

At the same time the <st data-num="0428" class="">men</st> who had taken the city <st data-num="03318 04480 05892">came out</st> to <st data-num="07125" class="">fight</st>, and the men of Ai <st data-num="01961 03478">were</st> <st data-num="08432 0428 02088 0428 02088">trapped in the middle</st>.<n id="1" /> The Israelites <st data-num="05221" class="">struck</st> them <st data-num="05221" class="">down</st>, <st data-num="07604" class="">leaving</st> <st data-num="05704 01115">no</st> <st data-num="08300" class="">survivors</st> or <st data-num="06412" class="">refugees</st>.
But they captured the king of Ai alive and brought him to Joshua.
When Israel had finished killing all the men of Ai who had chased them toward the wilderness (they all fell by the sword), all Israel returned to Ai and put the sword to it.

So <st data-num="08147 06240 0505" class="">12,000</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">and</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st> <st data-num="01961 03605 05307">died</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>, including <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="05857" class="">Ai</st>.

<st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="03808 07725">kept</st> <st data-num="03027 0834 05186">holding out</st> his <st data-num="03591" class="">curved sword</st> <st data-num="05704 0834">until</st> Israel had <st data-num="02763" class="">annihilated</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st> in <st data-num="05857" class="">Ai</st>.<n id="1" />
But Israel did plunder the cattle and the goods of the city, in keeping with the Lord’s orders to Joshua.

<st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="08313" class="">burned</st> <st data-num="05857" class="">Ai</st> and <st data-num="07760" class="">made</st> it a <st data-num="05769" class="">permanently</st> <st data-num="08077" class="">uninhabited</st> <st data-num="08510" class="">mound</st> (it remains that way <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> very <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>).<n id="1" />

He hung the king of Ai on a tree, leaving him exposed until evening. At sunset Joshua ordered that his corpse be taken down from the tree. They threw it down at the entrance of the city gate and erected over it a large pile of stones (it remains to this very day).
Then Joshua built an altar for the Lord God of Israel on Mount Ebal,

just as Moses the Lord’s servant had commanded the Israelites. As described in the law scroll of Moses, it was made with uncut stones untouched by an iron tool. On it they offered burnt sacrifices to the Lord and sacrificed tokens of peace.

<st data-num="08033" class="">There</st>, <st data-num="06440" class="">in the presence of</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>, Joshua <st data-num="03789" class="">inscribed</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st> a <st data-num="04932" class="">duplicate</st> of the <st data-num="08451 0834">law</st> <st data-num="03789" class="">written</st> by <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st>.<n id="1" />

All the people, rulers, leaders, and judges were standing on either side of the ark, in front of the Levitical priests who carried the ark of the covenant of the Lord. Both resident foreigners and native Israelites were there. Half the people stood in front of Mount Gerizim and the other half in front of Mount Ebal, as Moses the Lord’s servant had previously instructed them to do for the formal blessing ceremony.

<st data-num="0310 03651">Then</st><n id="1" /> Joshua <st data-num="07121" class="">read aloud</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st> of the <st data-num="08451" class="">law</st>, including the <st data-num="01293" class="">blessings</st> and the <st data-num="07045" class="">curses</st>, just <st data-num="03605" class="">as</st> they are <st data-num="03789" class="">written</st> in the <st data-num="08451" class="">law</st> <st data-num="05612" class="">scroll</st>.
Joshua read aloud every commandment Moses had given before the whole assembly of Israel, including the women, children, and resident foreigners who lived among them.
